release.description: Still more refactorings, documentation upgrades and bug fixes
release.action: Removed IModel constructors throughout the project and added instanceof logic to Component to wrap model objects unless they are already IModel implementors. Updated documentation to reflect this.

Implemented getModelLock() method on Component so that client code can synchronize updates to the model for a component. Updated core code so that it synchronizes on the returned lock object (which is currently the model's object as returned by IModel.getObject()) during rendering and form model updating. This lack of synchronization was a bug in the guestbook application which never showed symptoms simply because it had never been used by many users at once.
Reworked examples navigation. Worked on code for GuestBook and GuestBook2. Provided base classes for future examples to extend (WicketExampleApplication, WicketExamplePage).

Reworked feedback messages code significantly including the FeedbackMessages container class. Removed all the thread-local code and put feedback messages into Page instead. Added info(), debug(), warning(), error() and fatal() convenience methods to Component which report messages via the Page's FeedbackMessages container object.
Wrote a new persistence abstraction that is more abstract and free of Cookieness (IValuePersister). Implemented this interface using browser cookies in the new class CookieValuePersister.
Got rid of ValidationErrorDecorator and other code by doing a major refactor of the form validation package.
Split up ApplicationSettings and ApplicationPages and moved many of the non-settings getters to Application.
Fixed guestbook test and other problems with example tests.
Made examples work from http://localhost:8080 via redirecting.
Created FAQ page and added an explanation of why so many classes and methods are final

Added comments and refactored renderBody to the more illustrative name renderComponentTagBody. Also changed names throughout the project to match this pattern. Simplified renderComponentTag() by folding in stripComponentName() logic and removed the overload of that method which advances the markup stream in addition to rendering the tag.
Closed request to make RawMarkup class public since we do not want to expose this implementation detail.
Changed parser to allow single quotes as well as double quotes around attribute values in XML tags.
Fixed bug where popups expire due to removeNewerThan call in HttpRequestCycle. Also removed the method itself since it is not used for any other purpose.

Closed RFE to allow custom object properties on ApplicationSettings since ApplicationSettings is really only for Wicket configuration.
To store "global" objects for your application, just put regular old Java properties on your Application subclass. If I'm somehow missing your point, please reopen the bug and explain why subclassing Application won't provide the functionality you need.
Closed old RFE for license aggregation since we already have the licenses available in the licenses folder in the core.

Major reworking of converter code. Folded localized converters into a single set of converters, removing casts to ILocalizable in the process. Implemented converters for all Java primitive types plus Date, Timestamp and String. Added javadoc documentation for converter API. Refactored Component, TypeValidator and Session code to use the new converter code and to enable customization through overrides of getConverter(). Wrote new tests for converters.
Refactored ComponentTagAttributeModifier and changed name to AttributeModifier. Made more of this class private and removed inappropriate tests of private API.
Renamed IIdList -> IDetachableChoiceList and IdListAdaptor -> DetachableChoiceList
Renamed IPageLink.getPageClass() -> IPageLink.getPageIdentity()
Moved wicket-examples-hangman into the wicket-examples project.
Hangman gives NPE at startup
Made 'maven eclipse:generate-classpath' plugin work with eclipse projects.
Changed the component markup to<wicket:xxxx>
Changed the registration of the servlet in web.xml to wicket.protocol.http.WicketServlet
Refactored autolinkand borderto match the<wicket:xxxx>component markup
Simplified IMarkupParser
Javadoc for several components updated.
Refactored MarkupParser

Refactored and documented:
wicket
wicket.model
wicket.protocol
wicket.response
wicket.request
wicket.util

release.description: Really the last release before march to 1.0
release.action: Added Spring-framework integration example to Wicket-examples.
Added support for dynamic languages like Groovy. An example has been added to wicket-examples.
Javadoc bug in MultiLineLabel.
Font bug in paragraph.
Quickstart distribution not downloadable
Fixed javadoc warning in ApplicationSettings.
ListChoice Does not Support 'expression' binding
Create a contrib section (site & cvs) where high level components and other contributions that should not be part of the core can be put.
Added quickstart project
Move packages from com.voicetribe.* to wicket.*
Replaced the default design of a maven generated website with a more pleasing, non standard look and feel.
Added Clover logo to front page of our website.
Added support for a configurable character encoding (i18n) for markup files and HTTP response. And added a new example to show how it works.
Model for PasswordTextField will now be encrypted for persistence (cookie)
Fixed autoIndex bug. AutoIndex numbers are now unique across a whole page.
Added lots of new and improved Table features. Examples contain displaytag like demos.
signin example now includes a rememberMe functionality
Introduced new ComponentTagAttributeModifier class and associated methods as a direct replacement for HtmlTagModifier and its subclasses.
Added reset password flag for PasswordTextField in order to support input forms without emptying the contents.
Implemented multi field validation.
Implemented support for ui messaging (also used by validation). FeedbackPanel uses this, and is more generic now as well.
Introduced ListView for lists (former Tables) that do not use paging. Table supports paging.
Fixed bug that resulted in random session timeouts.
Converted confluence documentation to xdocs.
